```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# In the Quarto doc, create an exploratory (unfinalized) plot of fiddler crab carapace widths observed at the different latitudes

crab_explore <- pie_crab 

ggplot(data = crab_explore,
       aes(x = size,
           y = latitude)) +
  geom_point()
  
```
